title: Find us on Facebook!
content:
Fontpartners.com is now on Facebook! All about fonts: Start a new topic, display reviews, share links & events, etc.

Become a Fan:  
 [http://www.facebook.com/pages/Fontpartnerscom/33187212502](http://web.archive.org/web/20140807053227/http:/www.facebook.com/pages/Fontpartnerscom/33187212502 "http://www.facebook.com/pages/Fontpartnerscom/33187212502")

Regards from the crazy Danes,  
Ole Søndergaard (FF Signa)  
Morten Rostgaard Olsen (FF Max, FF Olsen)
author: morten
